description.@en: Where desperate attempts to bargain fail, you are there to demand harsh compensation.

effect.@en: You may flip the results to succeed at Intimidate Tests. When you succeed, it is always considered a Critical Success. In addition, when you successfully Intimidate someone, you inflict 1D10+your [WB] in mental Peril. Finally, you may substitute Fellowship in place of Brawn when determining Base Chance of success with the Intimidate Skill.
